'''''Amon Hen'' 231''' is the two-hundred-and-thirty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[September]] [[2011]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen231.jpg|Sigurd]]''
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Additional Decorative Artwork
** By: Steve Lines
* Announcements
* Along the road - [[The Return of the Ring|2012 news]]
** By: Lynn Whitaker
* Artwork: ''[[Bag End]]''
** By: Chris Bell
* Report: Tolkien Birmingham Events
** By: Sara Brown
* Poem: ''[[Barliman Butterbur]]''
** By: Sue Bridgwater
* Artwork: ''Barliman Butterbur''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* The Great Gate Debate
** By: David Doerr/[[Wayne G. Hammond|Hammond]] & [[Christina Scull|Scull]]
* Artwork: ''[[Théoden]]''
** By: Chris Bell
* Behind Glass Doors
* The Black Arrow
** By: Gordon Palmer
* Review: ''Toward the Gleam''
** By: Anne Marie Gazzolo
* Review: ''[[Cirith Ungol (band)|Cirith Ungol]]'' CDr
** By: Michael Cunningham
* Letters
* News from [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* Around the World in 80(?) [[Tolkien Societies|Societies]]
** By: [[The Brazilian Tolkien Society|Brazilian Tolkien Society]]
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* New Members/Dates for your Diary
* Artwork: ''Setting Out''
** By: Chris Bell
* Committee
